english.segment1: Holy, Holy. Is the Lord Almighty
english.segment2: Infinite God, Great Mystery. Dwelling in light which no man can see. Consuming Fire, lofty and near. Gentle and strong, due both love and fear
english.segment3: Who was and is and ever shall be
english.segment4: HALLELUJAH FOR OUR LORD GOD ALMIGHT REIGNS. JUST AND HOLY, HE IS WORTHY, OUR GOD REIGNS
english.segment5: Faithful and True, All- Righteous Judge. With eyes of fire, He is coming to the earth. Word of God, with fury and with sword. He is King of kings, he is Lord of lords
english.segment6: Who was and is and is to come
english.segment7: Almighty, all- knowing, ever- loving, never changing. Transcendent, self sufficient, self -existent, ever present. Sovereign Maker, Jealous Savior. Righteous Father, Holy Spirit. Unchanging, unfailing, never- ending, everlasting
english.segment9: All glory and honor be unto the lamb. forever and ever and ever Amen!
